720105f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Norfolk Street
720105f-a.text:
g374 Grand Street, at the North East corner of Norfolk,. to le't and adjoining State Bank. Stores of every variety may be noted in the corner Store.
MAY BE PRODUCED.  About 1900.
720105f-a.folder: Grand Street & Norfolk Street, Manhattan, NY

720104f-a.title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Norfolk Street
720104f-a.text:
372-376 Grand Street, at, and adjoining the N.E. corner of Norfolk Street. Also shown is Norfolk Street, at, adjoining and north of the N.E. corner of Grand Street. Nos. 376 Grand and 52-54 Norfolk Streets, is the same building, and is the home of the Manufacturer's Trust Co. The two 3-story buildings shown, adjoining the corner, are Nos. 50 and 50 1/2 Norfolk
Street.
October 12, 1931.
'. L. Sperr.
